title: The identified land for slum relocation under S
clause_text: The identified land for slum relocation under S.R.S. shall be conveyed in favor of S.R.A. upon approval of such S.R.S. The T.D.R. for the unencumbered land spared for this purpose as mentioned above (hereinafter referred as Land T.D.R.) shall thereafter be granted to the unencumbered plot.
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
